First strike
[i]Blade Honor[/i] – When Kamui enters, create a 1/1 red Mercenary creature token with “{T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”
[i]Crosswise Cut[/i] – Whenever Kamui becomes the target of a spell or ability, he gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
[i]Promote[/i] – Whenever Kamui deals combat damage to a player, if his power is greater than his base power, transform him.
